Package org.planit.io.network.converter

Class PlanitNetworkWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.planit.network.converter.NetworkWriterImpl
      • org.planit.io.network.converter.PlanitNetworkWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkWriter
    public class PlanitNetworkWriter
extends NetworkWriterImpl
    Writer to persist a PLANit network to disk in the native PLANit format. By default the xml ids are used for writing out the ids in the XML.
    Author:
    markr
